name: Paper Jam (ElijahAbarbanel)
description:
Tree Killers Inc. is back at it again with their newest product, Precision Paper™! With its patented‘Aerodynamic Nanofiber TECHNOLOGY™  and an effective range of up to 50m (164ft), it stands tall as the world's most accurate printer paper. The masses are desperate to be part of the Paper Revolution™ , and it’s your job to satisfy them!

       In this  dynamic, original, action packed, arcade classic, you take the role of one of a million nationwide Tree Killers Inc. sales experts! It’s your job to make sure every Customer gets the paper they want and desperately need. Deliver that paper, and watch your profits soar. Just don’t let the customers leave empty handed, or it’s all over for you!

       Can you get the high-score and seize the title of Paper Grand-Master!?!?!?!?

Credits:

Art:

       Liam Fitch

       Ray Martin

       Kevin Resnick

       Issac Young

Design:

Sound:

Programming:

       Jethro Schoppenthorts

       Lavance Strickand

(This game was made for Alpha Lab's second FA 2018 Game Jam)
